name: Sweltering Heat
description: The cheap warehouse you rented for '{scene_title}' has no air conditioning, and it's boiling inside. {talent_name} is complaining that they can't work under these conditions.

choices.text: Tell them to deal with it.
choices.hint: Their performance in this scene will suffer.

effects.message: {talent_name} reluctantly continues, but their unhappiness is clear.

choices.hint: Solves the problem for a price.

effects.message: The fans arrive and cool the set. The shoot proceeds without issue.

name: Construction Work Nearby
description: There is construction work going on near the shooting location of '{scene_title}' and the mics clearly pick it up.

choices.hint: The quality of the scene will suffer.

effects.message: The noise is impossible to mask.

choices.hint: You will incur costs for the delay ($400).

effects.message: You wait for a while until the noise isn't as disruptive.

choices.text: Go to the noise source and try to put an end to it.
choices.hint: Who knows what you'll find there.

name: The Confrontation
description: You find the construction crew on their lunch break. They don't seem happy to be interrupted. Their foreman, a large man named 'Tiny', asks what you want.

choices.text: Offer them $150 to take a long lunch.
choices.hint: A simple solution, if you have the cash.

effects.message: 'Tiny' accepts your 'donation'. The crew enjoys an extended lunch break, giving you quiet time to shoot.

choices.text: Try to intimidate them into stopping.
choices.hint: This could go very wrong.

effects.message: They're surprisingly intimidated! They agree to work quietly for the next hour.
Your intimidation attempt is met with laughter. Annoyed, they start up a jackhammer 'by accident'. The noise is worse now.

choices.text: Explain your situation and ask nicely.
choices.hint: Appeals to their better nature... if they have one.

effects.message: 'Tiny' grunts, but agrees to keep the loudest work until later. The shoot can proceed.
They tell you they have a schedule to keep. The noise continues unabated.

choices.text: Offer them first row seats to the shot.
choices.hint: Appeals to their baser nature...

effects.message: The foreman enthusiastically agrees and the workers come to the shooting location, ready to enjoy the show.
They tell you they have a schedule to keep. The noise continues unabated.

name: Pigeon Attack!
description: A flock of pigeons seems to be carrying out a remarkably coordinated aerial attack on the set of '{scene_title}', causing all sorts of trouble to talent and crew.

choices.hint: They are probably just seeking attention.

effects.message: They keep up their shenanigans, annoying everyone on set and affecting the scene quality.

choices.text: Seek a truce with the pigeons.
choices.hint: You will incur costs for the delay ($400).

effects.message: You wait for a while until the noise isn't as disruptive.

choices.hint: Better to allow professionals to do their job ($500).

effects.message: You had to pay the pest control company and everyone on-set for the delay, but the scene proceeded without issues from there.

choices.hint: No pigeons can stop you.

effects.message: Victory! Against all odds, the cast and crew manage to drive off the avian menace. The shoot proceeds.
It's a disaster. The pigeons are surprisingly resilient and make a huge mess. The set is ruined for the day.

choices.hint: It's not a good omen.

effects.message: You cancelled the shoot for the day to ensure the higher power didn't get upset, but the bloc's costs for the day are lost.

name: Catering Praise
description: The gourmet catering is a huge hit! {talent_name} pulls you aside to say it's the best food they've ever had on set. This will surely boost morale.

choices.hint: The happy cast will perform slightly better.

effects.message: The excellent catering has boosted morale and improved the scene's final quality.

name: Wardrobe Issue
description: {talent_name} reports that none of the provided condoms fit properly, causing a delay while a runner is sent out to find a different size.

choices.hint: A small cost is incurred to resolve the issue.

effects.message: A runner was dispatched to find suitable condoms. The shoot was slightly delayed.

name: Health Concern
description: During prep, someone on set notices what could be a symptom of an STD on {talent_name}. The shoot is halted as everyone looks to you for a decision.

choices.hint: Risk alienating the other performers.

effects.message: The shoot continues, but the atmosphere on set is tense.

choices.hint: You'll lose the salary costs for today's shoot.

effects.message: You cancelled the shoot for the day to ensure everyone's safety. The bloc's costs for the day are lost.

name: Under the Influence
description: {talent_name} has arrived on set clearly high. Since you have a relaxed drug policy, they don't see it as a problem, but their performance might be erratic.

choices.text: Let them perform. It might be interesting.
choices.hint: Their performance will be unpredictable. Could be great, could be terrible.

effects.message: You let {talent_name} perform. It was... memorable.

choices.text: Try to get them to sober up first.
choices.hint: This will delay the shoot and may not be fully effective.

effects.message: After a delay and a lot of coffee, the shoot proceeds, but it's not their best work.

name: Policy Violation
description: {talent_name} has arrived on set clearly high, in direct violation of your on-set drug policy. The crew is looking to you to see how you'll enforce the rules.

choices.text: Send them home immediately. No pay.
choices.hint: Enforces your rules strictly, but you'll have to cancel the scene and lose their salary.

effects.message: You sent {talent_name} home without pay. Your authority is clear, but the scene is a wash for today.

choices.text: Give a stern warning and let it slide.
choices.hint: The shoot can proceed, but your rules will be seen as empty threats. Their performance will be poor.

effects.message: You let {talent_name} work after a stern warning, but your policy now seems toothless.

name: Hygiene Issue
description: During a take for '{scene_title}', it becomes apparent that {talent_name} did not properly prepare for the anal scene. The shoot is paused due to the unsanitary conditions.

choices.hint: You'll lose the salary costs for today's shoot.

effects.message: You cancel the shoot. It's a costly but necessary decision.

choices.text: Delay the shoot for a clean-up.
choices.hint: The scene quality will suffer from the delay and bad mood.

effects.message: After a lengthy and unpleasant delay, the shoot continues, but the mood is ruined.

name: Hygiene Complaint
description: After a take, {other_talent_name} pulls you aside to complain about {talent_name}'s poor personal hygiene. The mood on set is souring.

choices.text: Tell them to be professional and deal with it.
choices.hint: The complaining talent's morale and performance will drop.

effects.message: {other_talent_name} is unhappy with your response, but gets back to work.

choices.hint: May cause embarrassment and affect their performance.

effects.message: You have a quiet word with {talent_name}. The issue is addressed, but they seem embarrassed.

name: Allergic Reaction
description: {talent_name} is having an allergic reaction to the makeup, causing their skin to become red and blotchy. The shoot must be delayed while it's addressed.

choices.hint: The delay will slightly reduce the final scene quality.

effects.message: The cream helps, and after a short delay, shooting resumes.
